Hey Tolans here is the way I found the keygen. Open the CD directory and search for HATRED, you will probably see the keygen icon there. I hope it could help you buddy.

Open the file and extract Hatred file to Desktop

1.Open Alcohol 120%
2. Go to file "open" locate your Tiger woods file
3. Double click and let it load, when asked for serial open "Hatred" file double click "Keygen" this should automatically enter the serial numbers if not do it yourself.
4.Follow your on screen commands till finished.
5.open Hatred file again and "copy" the "Tigers Woods PGA Tour (R)08".
6. Go to computer, program files, EA Sports file locate and open "Bin" file and paste, say yes to over write file. That should work.
